metadata.dc:author: Aguado Santos, A
García Varela, L
Romero Méndez, A
Sánchez López, M
Esparza Gómez, G
Seoane Lestón, J M
metadata.dc:description: The presence of human papillomavirus antigen was studied in palate papillomas and in verruca vulgaris located in the palate using the Peroxidase-Antiperoxidase immunohistochemical methods. The antigens were detected only in the nuclei of cells of the stratum granulosum and stratum corneum in some cases of verruca vulgaris but not in any case of palate papillomas.
metadata.dc:title: Detección de antigenos de Papilomavirus humano (HPV) en lesiones papilomatosas del paladar.
[Detection of human papillomavirus antigens in papillomatous lesions of the palate].
